body:
Nhentai doujins are originally from e-hentai.org. On e-hentai.org, "gender bender" was changed to "gender change" due to "gender bender" used to be mutually exclusive with "body swap", which used to be very confusing. In addition, many people dislike "gender bender" doujin with elemets such as possession and bodyswap
The tag "gender morph" is now a seperate one for only transformation from male to female and vice versa. Copy this comment to every hentai if anyone ask this question.
Original forum thread: https://forums.e-hentai.org/index.php?showtopic=253088
yeah this is wierd i have gender bender paged saved but now i have to look in other tags to find new stuff
they're still working on that, maybe there's some error with gender bender tag, and they upload it with gender change instead  eade
so can anybody tell me why the gender bender tag basically died, and now all new posts are in gender change and gender morph?
